GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a single user object based on the parametric endpoint passed in

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article object based on the parametric endpont passed in

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the amount of votes on a single article and returns the full updated article object

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments attaached to a particular article
